text: Michael Wayne Rosen (born 7 May 1946)"About Me", Michael Rosen's official website is an English children's novelist and poet of Jewish descent.www.writewords.org.uk Rosen wrote over 140 books. He was the fifth British Children's Laureate from 2007 to 2009. He has been a republican advocate, socialist columnist and television presenter. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Michael Rosen blog * |T ciao :D * Michael Rosen at Penguin Readers' Group Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:English children's writers Category:English poets Category:Writers from London
title: Michael Rosen
